name: SNOWBALL (itch) (achitchcock)
description:
Snowball

Snowball is a 1v1 snowball fight game created for the LynXmas 2020 game jam.

Game play

The goal of the game is to get the highest score possible while trying to avoid the enemy snowballs.  Points are earned by hitting the enemy with a snowball.  Each time the player is hit they loose one life.  After 5 hits the game is over.  The high score will be tracked throughout the play session. Try and beat your own record!

Controls  

D-pad: Move left and right
A button: throw a snow ball.

Operation

The game may be played using an Atari Lynx console with a flash cart or via the use of a Lynx emulator such as Handy.
